scripts.clean: rimraf -rf build && mkdir build && mkdir build/email-templates && mkdir build/svg-templates && mkdir build/fonts && mkdir build/device-pages
scripts.build:live: npm run clean && tsc && npm run build:live:copy && mkdir build/uploads && mkdir build/uploads/firmwares
scripts.build:copy: cp configs/config.ini build/conf/config.ini && cp package.json build/package.json && cp src/svg-templates/ build/ -r && cp src/fonts/ build/ -r
scripts.build:copy:folders: cp src/emails/templates/* build/email-templates -r && cp src/fonts/* build/fonts -r && cp src/svg-templates/* build/svg-templates -r
scripts.build:live:copy: cp configs/config_live.ini build/conf/config.ini && cp package.json build/package.json && npm run build:copy:folders
scripts.build:deploy: npm run clean && npm run build && pm2 start build/index.js --time
scripts.prestart: sudo service mongod start && sudo service redis-server start
scripts.start: npm run prestart && nodemon --config nodemon.json src/index.ts
